column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5422cca4fdf99b328c91b21b', 'recall_text': "There was a lady who was a neighbour who had a grandson. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '54232b4bfdf99b328c91b253', 'recall_text': "In the town that I grew up in there was an old cat lady. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '56815ef3c5767f00121d2088', 'recall_text': "There was a girl who lived next door to a woman who had 20 cats (or so) plus her son. Her son wanted to befriend the girl, but the girl didn't realise that. She found him charming but didn't like his manners. So one day the boy wrote a letter to her saying that he is running away. His mother found out and asked the girl about him. Holding a big tabby cat in her hand. The girl suggested that they call the police which the mum did. They also went to look for him themselves. They found a baseball cap near an old mill. but nothing else. So they went back and found him sitting on a tree branch reading a comic book. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '56b39f0b2bac74000c89df22', 'recall_text': "Mrs Baker had 20 cats and lived in same neighbourhood as storyteller/narrator. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '59566581a2372d0001289380', 'recall_text': "Mrs Barker had a grandson and lots of cats The grandson had very bad manners He tried to be friend with me One day he left a note saying he would run away Mrs Baker went looking for him at the factory but he couldn't be found and she would phone the police Sheriff Dawson He was found sitting on a tree branch reading a comic and hadn't run away Sheriff Dawson said he should stay out of sight as that woman doesn't forget a thing.", 'recall_len': 431, 'max_clause_id': 15, 'mbits_original_narrative': 14.08, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 15.89}
column2: {'segment_id': 2, 'segment_text': 'She had adopted at least twenty –', 'recall_id': '59566581a2372d0001289380', 'recall_text': "Mrs Barker had a grandson and lots of cats The grandson had very bad manners He tried to be friend with me One day he left a note saying he would run away Mrs Baker went looking for him at the factory but he couldn't be found and she would phone the police Sheriff Dawson He was found sitting on a tree branch reading a comic and hadn't run away Sheriff Dawson said he should stay out of sight as that woman doesn't forget a thing.", 'recall_len': 431, 'max_clause_id': 15, 'mbits_original_narrative': -2.59, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'She had taken in no fewer than twenty –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -3.12}
column3: {'segment_id': 3, 'segment_text': 'or had given them homes.', 'recall_id': '59566581a2372d0001289380', 'recall_text': "Mrs Barker had a grandson and lots of cats The grandson had very bad manners He tried to be friend with me One day he left a note saying he would run away Mrs Baker went looking for him at the factory but he couldn't be found and she would phone the police Sheriff Dawson He was found sitting on a tree branch reading a comic and hadn't run away Sheriff Dawson said he should stay out of sight as that woman doesn't forget a thing.", 'recall_len': 431, 'max_clause_id': 15, 'mbits_original_narrative': 7.0, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'or had provided them with shelter.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.86}
column4: {'segment_id': 4, 'segment_text': 'But she had – a young grandson', 'recall_id': '59566581a2372d0001289380', 'recall_text': "Mrs Barker had a grandson and lots of cats The grandson had very bad manners He tried to be friend with me One day he left a note saying he would run away Mrs Baker went looking for him at the factory but he couldn't be found and she would phone the police Sheriff Dawson He was found sitting on a tree branch reading a comic and hadn't run away Sheriff Dawson said he should stay out of sight as that woman doesn't forget a thing.", 'recall_len': 431, 'max_clause_id': 15, 'mbits_original_narrative': 16.89, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Yet she had – a young grandchild', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 11.89}

column6: {'segment_id': 6, 'segment_text': 'And apparently, he was trying to befriend me.', 'recall_id': '59566581a2372d0001289380', 'recall_text': "Mrs Barker had a grandson and lots of cats The grandson had very bad manners He tried to be friend with me One day he left a note saying he would run away Mrs Baker went looking for him at the factory but he couldn't be found and she would phone the police Sheriff Dawson He was found sitting on a tree branch reading a comic and hadn't run away Sheriff Dawson said he should stay out of sight as that woman doesn't forget a thing.", 'recall_len': 431, 'max_clause_id': 15, 'mbits_original_narrative': 11.08, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'And it seemed he was attempting to make friends with me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 11.61}

column9: {'segment_id': 9, 'segment_text': 'He was a charming lad until you saw his manners.', 'recall_id': '59566581a2372d0001289380', 'recall_text': "Mrs Barker had a grandson and lots of cats The grandson had very bad manners He tried to be friend with me One day he left a note saying he would run away Mrs Baker went looking for him at the factory but he couldn't be found and she would phone the police Sheriff Dawson He was found sitting on a tree branch reading a comic and hadn't run away Sheriff Dawson said he should stay out of sight as that woman doesn't forget a thing.", 'recall_len': 431, 'max_clause_id': 15, 'mbits_original_narrative': 6.67, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'He seemed like a sweet boy until you witnessed his etiquette.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 4.05}

column28: {'segment_id': 28, 'segment_text': 'But that evening the local sheriff, Officer Dawson said “You better lay low and stay out of sight because that woman never forgets anything once she gets it into her mind.”', 'recall_id': '59566581a2372d0001289380', 'recall_text': "Mrs Barker had a grandson and lots of cats The grandson had very bad manners He tried to be friend with me One day he left a note saying he would run away Mrs Baker went looking for him at the factory but he couldn't be found and she would phone the police Sheriff Dawson He was found sitting on a tree branch reading a comic and hadn't run away Sheriff Dawson said he should stay out of sight as that woman doesn't forget a thing.", 'recall_len': 431, 'max_clause_id': 15, 'mbits_original_narrative': 37.83, 'segment_text_rephrased': "However, that night the town's sheriff, Officer Dawson, warned, “You'd best keep a low profile and hide because once something's in that lady's head, she never lets it go.”", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 35.17}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '59777c084bfdcf0001f7bbc7', 'recall_text': "An old lady Mrs Dawson had about 20 cats she adopted a girl that was a tomboy it she was a lot of trouble she left a note saying she would run away but she didn't run away she was sat in a tree with a table cat in tow the sheriff said stay out of sight as once that woman gets something in her head she never forgets.", 'recall_len': 317, 'max_clause_id': 11, 'mbits_original_narrative': 7.84, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 7.28}
column2: {'segment_id': 2, 'segment_text': 'She had adopted at least twenty –', 'recall_id': '59777c084bfdcf0001f7bbc7', 'recall_text': "An old lady Mrs Dawson had about 20 cats she adopted a girl that was a tomboy it she was a lot of trouble she left a note saying she would run away but she didn't run away she was sat in a tree with a table cat in tow the sheriff said stay out of sight as once that woman gets something in her head she never forgets.", 'recall_len': 317, 'max_clause_id': 11, 'mbits_original_narrative': 4.49, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'She had taken in no fewer than twenty –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.06}
column3: {'segment_id': 3, 'segment_text': 'or had given them homes.', 'recall_id': '59777c084bfdcf0001f7bbc7', 'recall_text': "An old lady Mrs Dawson had about 20 cats she adopted a girl that was a tomboy it she was a lot of trouble she left a note saying she would run away but she didn't run away she was sat in a tree with a table cat in tow the sheriff said stay out of sight as once that woman gets something in her head she never forgets.", 'recall_len': 317, 'max_clause_id': 11, 'mbits_original_narrative': 5.92, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'or had provided them with shelter.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.02}
column4: {'segment_id': 4, 'segment_text': 'But she had – a young grandson', 'recall_id': '59777c084bfdcf0001f7bbc7', 'recall_text': "An old lady Mrs Dawson had about 20 cats she adopted a girl that was a tomboy it she was a lot of trouble she left a note saying she would run away but she didn't run away she was sat in a tree with a table cat in tow the sheriff said stay out of sight as once that woman gets something in her head she never forgets.", 'recall_len': 317, 'max_clause_id': 11, 'mbits_original_narrative': 6.33, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Yet she had – a young grandchild', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.54}

column10: {'segment_id': 10, 'segment_text': 'He had poor manners.', 'recall_id': '59777c084bfdcf0001f7bbc7', 'recall_text': "An old lady Mrs Dawson had about 20 cats she adopted a girl that was a tomboy it she was a lot of trouble she left a note saying she would run away but she didn't run away she was sat in a tree with a table cat in tow the sheriff said stay out of sight as once that woman gets something in her head she never forgets.", 'recall_len': 317, 'max_clause_id': 11, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.04, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'His manners were lacking.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.2}
column11: {'segment_id': 11, 'segment_text': 'Goodness gracious he had poor manners.', 'recall_id': '59777c084bfdcf0001f7bbc7', 'recall_text': "An old lady Mrs Dawson had about 20 cats she adopted a girl that was a tomboy it she was a lot of trouble she left a note saying she would run away but she didn't run away she was sat in a tree with a table cat in tow the sheriff said stay out of sight as once that woman gets something in her head she never forgets.", 'recall_len': 317, 'max_clause_id': 11, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.71, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'My word, his manners were atrocious.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.19}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5a099b6ca383a100011b49ec', 'recall_text': "Mrs Baker, a woman with a lot of cats, had a grandson. That grandson was quite fond of a girl (the narrator) but the feeling wasn't reciprocated. The boy ended up running away over the nagging from his grandmother, nagging about the relationship with the girl. Mrs Baker went to see the girl to confront her about the grandson running away. They both went to look for him but, other than his baseball cap, found no sign. When they returned they found him sitting on a tree branch, reading a comic. He hadn't run away. For some reason a policeman told the girl to lay low as Mrs Baker wouldn't forget what had happened easily.", 'recall_len': 625, 'max_clause_id': 15, 'mbits_original_narrative': 20.74, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 21.67}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5b082f3d61cde20001b6706e', 'recall_text': "I had a neighbour called Mrs Baker who was a crazy cat lady. She had at least 20 cats or had rehomed some, she lived with her grandson. I was a tomboy. The grandson wanted to be my friend but I didn't like him. He was not nice and had poor manners, goodness gracious me he had poor manners. One day he left a note saying he had run away the grandmother came to me to ask to help find him she kept nagging. I said we will look for him and then call the police if needed. We went looking and found his baseball cap at the old mill but no trace of him. We went to the treehouse club and found him reading a comic. Sherriff Dawson said I should stay low for a while as the old lady doesn't forget so I laid low out of sight. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5b3f93fc1388aa0001a80aaf', 'recall_text': "In the neighbourhood I grew up in there was a woman named Mrs. Baker who had adopted or given homes to 20 or more cats. One day he had left a note saying he was going to run away. She came to me in my treehouse with a big tabby cat in tow, and asked me to help find him. I said I would help but then she can call the police. We went to the quarry and traced his steps and found his baseball cap but then we couldn't trace him. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5bdf514805ba8e0001965d25', 'recall_text': 'Mrs Baker had 20 cats, adopted. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5cb1fdb11a4c6a0015fdcdf7', 'recall_text': 'In my neighbourhood there was a lady who liked cats she had about 20 she had a grandson I used to play with him one day he ran away as she was nagging him she came to see me in my treehouse with a tabby cat in tow we went to find him the place where he left his baseball cap but he was sat on a branch the officer came and said he was safe and not to tell the old woman that was my second day.', 'recall_len': 393, 'max_clause_id': 17, 'mbits_original_narrative': 11.59, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 12.77}

column3: {'segment_id': 3, 'segment_text': 'or had given them homes.', 'recall_id': '5cb1fdb11a4c6a0015fdcdf7', 'recall_text': 'In my neighbourhood there was a lady who liked cats she had about 20 she had a grandson I used to play with him one day he ran away as she was nagging him she came to see me in my treehouse with a tabby cat in tow we went to find him the place where he left his baseball cap but he was sat on a branch the officer came and said he was safe and not to tell the old woman that was my second day.', 'recall_len': 393, 'max_clause_id': 17, 'mbits_original_narrative': 7.88, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'or had provided them with shelter.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.91}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5cea26087afd86001a34a5db', 'recall_text': "In the neighbourhood where I lived there was a woman called Mrs Baker. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5cf096dbb094d700013e4f87', 'recall_text': "When I was young, in the neighborhood I grew up in, there was a woman named Mrs. Baker. She was a cat lady, and had at least twenty cats, or had found homes for them. She had a grandson who liked me, but I didn't like him much because he had very poor manners. One day he wrote me a note that he was going to run away. Mrs. Baker said we would look for him, and if we didn't find him I told her she should call the police. We went to the place where his ball cap was found, but we didn't find him even after a bit more trailing. We returned to the treehouse, and he was sitting on a branch reading a comic book. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5dc5c2dfe0089e56432b4d6c', 'recall_text': 'There was a cat lady who had 20 cats her grandson went missing one day and she went to a tree house to try and find him.', 'recall_len': 120, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 7.84, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 10.19}
column2: {'segment_id': 2, 'segment_text': 'She had adopted at least twenty –', 'recall_id': '5dc5c2dfe0089e56432b4d6c', 'recall_text': 'There was a cat lady who had 20 cats her grandson went missing one day and she went to a tree house to try and find him.', 'recall_len': 120, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 2.61, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'She had taken in no fewer than twenty –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.79}

At the time I was a tomboy. one day her grandson left a note that he was going  to run away as Mrs baker always nagged him about me and he had enough. She came by the treehouse I liked to hang out in and asked for help to find him, I agreed to help and if he could not be found by the end of the day we would alert the police. We went to the mill where he liked to hang out and found his baseball cap, from there the trail went cold. We then found him at the treehouse club with a comic, he hadn't actually run off. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5e7c89a515980f2c5cf93d5d', 'recall_text': "There was a woman who had a neighbour who looked after stray cats about 20 and she had a grandson. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5ea20fd571038c119083a8df', 'recall_text': 'Mrs Baker still lived in my old neighbourhood. She hoarded all different types of cats. She had up to twenty two at any one time. I recall visiting her. Her grand son was present. I remember that he had terrible manners. Really, really awful manners. Terrible! But he always helped his gran rescue her cats. The cats were from beyond our hideout. Way beyond the old treehouse. One cat got stuck in a treetop. We had a treehouse in that treetop. We used to spend summers in that treehouse. What fun! He was able to climb to the top. He could gently lift cats to safety. I could only climb up half way. Tomboy, that\'s what Mrs Baker used to call me. Her shrill tone of "Tomboy", still rings in my ears today. All these years later. Once, the cat lady, (for that what we called her), rang the police! She thought we were stuck in the tree. "What you doing up there, tomboy", she yelled at me. She was on the phone to the police. Arriving as though there was a hostage seige, two police cars swooped down the gravelly rough pathways. The pathways were through the tall lofty trees. The sound of the fire brigade was ringing out behind them. Everyone came out of their cottages. They were peering, and mumbling to each other over the fences. They were pointing at our treehouse. And that\'s all I can remember. I woke up on Mrs Baker\'s sofa. Several cats were licking my face. Her grand son was reading his comic. He was crosslegged on the floor directly opposite me. The police, with concerned frowns, were talking. They were pointing towards me. What a day that was! It was the second time!', 'recall_len': 1586, 'max_clause_id': 40, 'mbits_original_narrative': 28.35, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 28.64}

column7: {'segment_id': 7, 'segment_text': 'I never caught on.', 'recall_id': '5ea20fd571038c119083a8df', 'recall_text': 'Mrs Baker still lived in my old neighbourhood. She hoarded all different types of cats. She had up to twenty two at any one time. I recall visiting her. Her grand son was present. I remember that he had terrible manners. Really, really awful manners. Terrible! But he always helped his gran rescue her cats. The cats were from beyond our hideout. Way beyond the old treehouse. One cat got stuck in a treetop. We had a treehouse in that treetop. We used to spend summers in that treehouse. What fun! He was able to climb to the top. He could gently lift cats to safety. I could only climb up half way. Tomboy, that\'s what Mrs Baker used to call me. Her shrill tone of "Tomboy", still rings in my ears today. All these years later. Once, the cat lady, (for that what we called her), rang the police! column22: {'segment_id': 22, 'segment_text': "and we didn't find a trace.", 'recall_id': '5ea20fd571038c119083a8df', 'recall_text': 'Mrs Baker still lived in my old neighbourhood. She hoarded all different types of cats. She had up to twenty two at any one time. I recall visiting her. Her grand son was present. I remember that he had terrible manners. Really, really awful manners. Terrible! But he always helped his gran rescue her cats. The cats were from beyond our hideout. Way beyond the old treehouse. One cat got stuck in a treetop. We had a treehouse in that treetop. We used to spend summers in that treehouse. What fun! He was able to climb to the top. He could gently lift cats to safety. I could only climb up half way. Tomboy, that\'s what Mrs Baker used to call me. Her shrill tone of "Tomboy", still rings in my ears today. All these years later. Once, the cat lady, (for that what we called her), rang the police! She thought we were stuck in the tree. "What you doing up there, tomboy", she yelled at me. She was on the phone to the police. Arriving as though there was a hostage seige, two police cars swooped down the gravelly rough pathways. The pathways were through the tall lofty trees. The sound of the fire brigade was ringing out behind them. Everyone came out of their cottages. They were peering, and mumbling to each other over the fences. They were pointing at our treehouse. And that\'s all I can remember. I woke up on Mrs Baker\'s sofa. Several cats were licking my face. Her grand son was reading his comic. He was crosslegged on the floor directly opposite me. The police, with concerned frowns, were talking. They were pointing towards me. What a day that was! It was the second time!', 'recall_len': 1586, 'max_clause_id': 40, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.49, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and we came up empty-handed.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.27}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '5eb97e4abc41ad07dad1e3b5', 'recall_text': "There was a lady who adopted loads of cats 20 of them to remove eventually. She had a grandson who was a tomboy and he had bad manners. He went missing one day. They looked everywhere and found him sat in the tree house reading a comic. The lady said if they didn't find him she'd call the police. The police said to the boy to lie low at some point near the end of the story.", 'recall_len': 376, 'max_clause_id': 18, 'mbits_original_narrative': 5.86, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 7.57}

column8: {'segment_id': 8, 'segment_text': "Truth is I didn't take to him much because he had –", 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 6.39, 'segment_text_rephrased': "Honestly, I wasn't too fond of him because he had –", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 4.48}
column9: {'segment_id': 9, 'segment_text': 'He was a charming lad until you saw his manners.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 7.0, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'He seemed like a sweet boy until you witnessed his etiquette.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.1}
column10: {'segment_id': 10, 'segment_text': 'He had poor manners.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 3.14, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'His manners were lacking.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.89}
column11: {'segment_id': 11, 'segment_text': 'Goodness gracious he had poor manners.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.07, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'My word, his manners were atrocious.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.01}
column12: {'segment_id': 12, 'segment_text': 'Then he left a note one day saying he was going to run away because she was always nagging about me.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 16.51, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Then one day he left a message stating his plan to run away because she kept scolding him about me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 13.9}
column13: {'segment_id': 13, 'segment_text': 'She came to my treehouse.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.34, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'She approached my treehouse.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.62}
column14: {'segment_id': 14, 'segment_text': 'Big old tabby cat in tow.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': -2.15, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Carrying a large tabby cat along.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -4.31}
column15: {'segment_id': 15, 'segment_text': 'I talked her down', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.78, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I managed to calm her down', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.34}
column16: {'segment_id': 16, 'segment_text': "and said “Well we'll go find him", 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 5.87, 'segment_text_rephrased': "and suggested, “Well, let's go search for him", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.08}
column17: {'segment_id': 17, 'segment_text': "and if we can't locate him, you can – go ahead and call the police if you need to.”", 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.96, 'segment_text_rephrased': "and if he's nowhere to be found, then you can – feel free to contact the authorities if necessary.”", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.92}
column18: {'segment_id': 18, 'segment_text': 'I was strategizing.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.02, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I was making plans.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.38}

column22: {'segment_id': 22, 'segment_text': "and we didn't find a trace.", 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 3.75, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and we came up empty-handed.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 2.43}

column24: {'segment_id': 24, 'segment_text': '– it was a treehouse club –', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.53, 'segment_text_rephrased': '– it was a clubhouse in the trees –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.13}

column27: {'segment_id': 27, 'segment_text': 'But – however – that resolved it for that day.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.14, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'But – nonetheless – that settled things for the moment.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -3.4}
column28: {'segment_id': 28, 'segment_text': 'But that evening the local sheriff, Officer Dawson said “You better lay low and stay out of sight because that woman never forgets anything once she gets it into her mind.”', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 18.14, 'segment_text_rephrased': "However, that night the town's sheriff, Officer Dawson, warned, “You'd best keep a low profile and hide because once something's in that lady's head, she never lets it go.”", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 20.53}

column31: {'segment_id': 31, 'segment_text': 'and stayed out of sight.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.72, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and remained hidden.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.09}
column32: {'segment_id': 32, 'segment_text': 'That was the second time.', 'recall_id': '5f588f227723ca000cc5e08f', 'recall_text': "The story is about a lady who has cats, Mrs. Baker, and a Tomboy who has poor manners who wrote a note saying he is leaving and they had to look for him but he didn't run away he was in a tree house with his comic book after the sheriff said they should lay low.", 'recall_len': 262, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.69, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'That incident marked the second occasion.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.07}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '600b00d70c3b950f03a25bd1', 'recall_text': 'In my neighborhood, there was a cat lady. She had taken in around 20 cats plus adopting some out. She had a grandson that tried to become my friend. (I was like a tomboy.) I would not become his friend and he left a note saying he would run away. She came to my treehouse looking for him and asked me to help find him before calling the police. We looked around in some places but when we got back to the treehouse, he was there reading. He had not run away at all.', 'recall_len': 465, 'max_clause_id': 16, 'mbits_original_narrative': 16.87, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 15.72}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 21.97, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 22.6}
column2: {'segment_id': 2, 'segment_text': 'She had adopted at least twenty –', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.6, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'She had taken in no fewer than twenty –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.9}
column3: {'segment_id': 3, 'segment_text': 'or had given them homes.', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 9.19, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'or had provided them with shelter.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 5.83}
column4: {'segment_id': 4, 'segment_text': 'But she had – a young grandson', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 17.58, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Yet she had – a young grandchild', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 12.88}
column5: {'segment_id': 5, 'segment_text': 'and back then I was quite the tomboy.', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -3.37, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and at that time, I was quite the tomboy myself.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.45}
column6: {'segment_id': 6, 'segment_text': 'And apparently, he was trying to befriend me.', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -2.62, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'And it seemed he was attempting to make friends with me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -2.48}

column8: {'segment_id': 8, 'segment_text': "Truth is I didn't take to him much because he had –", 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 2.78, 'segment_text_rephrased': "Honestly, I wasn't too fond of him because he had –", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 2.27}

column10: {'segment_id': 10, 'segment_text': 'He had poor manners.', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.09, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'His manners were lacking.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.04}
column11: {'segment_id': 11, 'segment_text': 'Goodness gracious he had poor manners.', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.54, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'My word, his manners were atrocious.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.54}
column12: {'segment_id': 12, 'segment_text': 'Then he left a note one day saying he was going to run away because she was always nagging about me.', 'recall_id': '60205f5ba5fe0165fa0e5e01', 'recall_text': 'In a neighbourhood lived Mrs. Baker, a cat lady, she had a grandson who ran away one day only to be found in some treehouse club in the woods reading a comic book.', 'recall_len': 163, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 10.14, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Then one day he left a message stating his plan to run away because she kept scolding him about me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 7.74}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '608030a41cd2a2d7cabbba49', 'recall_text': 'Mrs Baker was my neighbor who had cats. She adopted about twenty cats when I was a tomboy. She had a son who I suspect he did not like me because his mother nagged about me. One day he ran away. He left me a note. She came to my tree house and asked me to help her find him so I did. We went to where they found his cap by the windmill but he was not there. Then we went to his favourite spot and we found him sitting at a bench. So he did not run away. Later the sheriff came. Officer said "She is not someone who forgets when she puts her mind to it, so you need to lay low and stay out of sight". So I laid low and stayed out of sight.', 'recall_len': 638, 'max_clause_id': 12, 'mbits_original_narrative': 26.43, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 25.52}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '60a65fa78c5f119da5e887e6', 'recall_text': 'In the neighbourhood that I grew up in, there was an old lady called Mrs Baker. She had or gave homes to about 20 cats. She had a grandson who tried to befriend me, back then I was a tomboy. Though he was nice to look at, he had poor manners. Mrs Baker wanted us to be friends. One day she came looking for me holding a toby cat, she thought her grandson had run away. I told her I would help her look for him before calling the police. We went towards the old mill and saw his baseball cap. We found him sitting in the old treehouse reading a comic. The sheriff came to see me later that day and told me to keep my distance from Mrs Baker, which was the second time. So I did.', 'recall_len': 677, 'max_clause_id': 16, 'mbits_original_narrative': 33.15, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 32.61}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '60c9fcbb6090f57f63cdbebf', 'recall_text': "In the neighbourhood where the girl lived, who was quite the tomboy, was a resident cat lady. One day the boy said that he was going to run away. The lady came to the treehouse with a big cat in tow and said he had run away. The girl suggested they look for him and then call the police. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '60ff2de87f8a6665bcff2144', 'recall_text': "In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady. She had adopted at least twenty – or had given them homes. But she had – a young grandson and back then I was quite the tomboy. And apparently, he was trying to befriend me. I never caught on. Truth is I didn't take to him much because he had – He was a charming lad until you saw his manners. He had poor manners. Goodness gracious he had poor manners. Then he left a note one day saying he was going to run away because she was always nagging about me. She came to my treehouse. Big old tabby cat in tow. I talked her down and said “Well we'll go find him and if we can't locate him, you can – go ahead and call the police if you need to.” I was strategizing. So she took my advice. And we went to where they found his baseball cap – near the old mill and we trailed a bit more and we didn't find a trace. And returned – it was a treehouse club – he was sitting on a branch with a comic book in his hand. He hadn't run away. But – however – that resolved it for that day. But that evening the local sheriff, Officer Dawson said “You better lay low and stay out of sight because that woman never forgets anything once she gets it into her mind.” And I did. I laid low and stayed out of sight. That was the second time.", 'recall_len': 1291, 'max_clause_id': 35, 'mbits_original_narrative': 38.28, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 37.13}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '610d1cf3c7b4411f1643e501', 'recall_text': 'The story is about a girl who lived in a neighborhood where there was a elderly lady called Mrs.Baker who was described as a "cat-lady", she was found of cats and adopted at least twenty. Her grandson tried to befriend the girl, but she didn\'t catch on as despite him being a good looking boy on the outside, he had horrible manners. One day, the boy said he would run away because his grandmother kept nagging him, on that day, the Grandmother came to the girl with cat in tow, asking her to help find her grandson, and so she did agree to go with her and find him, if they could not, she would call the police. After scouring around, they found his baseball cap, despite finding the baseball cap, treading further ahead yielded nothing other than locating a treehouse and they could not find the boy so they came back. When they came back, they found him on a tree reading comic books. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '62a0b26aea67b76bd50c8ea5', 'recall_text': "When I was growing up there was a crazy old cat lady named Mrs. Baker. She must have adopted 20 or so cats, and rehomed even more. She was always trying to get me with her grandson, who had really bad manners. He would always act as if he expected me to go with him, but boy his manners were so bad. One day he said he was going to run away from home because I turned him down, and his grandma came to my treehouse with a tabby cat in tow and said I had better go find him. I searched for hours but couldn't find a trace of him other than his baseball cap, so I told Mrs. Baker she had better call the police. As we were on our way back home there he was, in the treehouse with a comic book. He hadn't ran away from home at all. It seemed like everything was fine in the end, but then the local sheriff Officer Blake came over and told me that I had better lay low and stay out of sight because that woman never forgot a thing when she set her mind on something. So that's what I did, I laid low and stayed out of sight. That was the second time.", 'recall_len': 1046, 'max_clause_id': 22, 'mbits_original_narrative': 28.06, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 27.29}

column2: {'segment_id': 2, 'segment_text': 'She had adopted at least twenty –', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.98, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'She had taken in no fewer than twenty –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -2.65}

column4: {'segment_id': 4, 'segment_text': 'But she had – a young grandson', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 5.39, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Yet she had – a young grandchild', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.94}
column5: {'segment_id': 5, 'segment_text': 'and back then I was quite the tomboy.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.92, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and at that time, I was quite the tomboy myself.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.74}
column6: {'segment_id': 6, 'segment_text': 'And apparently, he was trying to befriend me.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 3.19, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'And it seemed he was attempting to make friends with me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.01}
column7: {'segment_id': 7, 'segment_text': 'I never caught on.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.64, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I never realized it.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 2.75}
column8: {'segment_id': 8, 'segment_text': "Truth is I didn't take to him much because he had –", 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.71, 'segment_text_rephrased': "Honestly, I wasn't too fond of him because he had –", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.72}
column9: {'segment_id': 9, 'segment_text': 'He was a charming lad until you saw his manners.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 2.34, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'He seemed like a sweet boy until you witnessed his etiquette.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.43}
column10: {'segment_id': 10, 'segment_text': 'He had poor manners.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.68, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'His manners were lacking.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.23}
column11: {'segment_id': 11, 'segment_text': 'Goodness gracious he had poor manners.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.82, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'My word, his manners were atrocious.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.85}
column12: {'segment_id': 12, 'segment_text': 'Then he left a note one day saying he was going to run away because she was always nagging about me.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 2.46, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Then one day he left a message stating his plan to run away because she kept scolding him about me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -2.54}
column13: {'segment_id': 13, 'segment_text': 'She came to my treehouse.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.36, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'She approached my treehouse.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.54}
column14: {'segment_id': 14, 'segment_text': 'Big old tabby cat in tow.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.18, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Carrying a large tabby cat along.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.22}
column15: {'segment_id': 15, 'segment_text': 'I talked her down', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.67, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I managed to calm her down', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.47}
column16: {'segment_id': 16, 'segment_text': "and said “Well we'll go find him", 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.15, 'segment_text_rephrased': "and suggested, “Well, let's go search for him", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -5.14}
column17: {'segment_id': 17, 'segment_text': "and if we can't locate him, you can – go ahead and call the police if you need to.”", 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 3.85, 'segment_text_rephrased': "and if he's nowhere to be found, then you can – feel free to contact the authorities if necessary.”", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.03}
column18: {'segment_id': 18, 'segment_text': 'I was strategizing.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.26, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I was making plans.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.84}
column19: {'segment_id': 19, 'segment_text': 'So she took my advice.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.97, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'So she heeded my counsel.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.21}
column20: {'segment_id': 20, 'segment_text': 'And we went to where they found his baseball cap – near the old mill', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -2.38, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'And we headed to the place where his baseball hat was discovered – by the old mill', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -2.26}
column21: {'segment_id': 21, 'segment_text': 'and we trailed a bit more', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.02, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and we continued searching', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.61}
column22: {'segment_id': 22, 'segment_text': "and we didn't find a trace.", 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.51, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and we came up empty-handed.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.49}

column24: {'segment_id': 24, 'segment_text': '– it was a treehouse club –', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.12, 'segment_text_rephrased': '– it was a clubhouse in the trees –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.79}
column25: {'segment_id': 25, 'segment_text': 'he was sitting on a branch with a comic book in his hand.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.35, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'he was perched on a limb, engrossed in a comic book.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.17}
column26: {'segment_id': 26, 'segment_text': "He hadn't run away.", 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.7, 'segment_text_rephrased': "He hadn't actually run off.", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.61}

column28: {'segment_id': 28, 'segment_text': 'But that evening the local sheriff, Officer Dawson said “You better lay low and stay out of sight because that woman never forgets anything once she gets it into her mind.”', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 13.64, 'segment_text_rephrased': "However, that night the town's sheriff, Officer Dawson, warned, “You'd best keep a low profile and hide because once something's in that lady's head, she never lets it go.”", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 9.65}

column30: {'segment_id': 30, 'segment_text': 'I laid low', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.65, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I kept a low profile', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.51}
column31: {'segment_id': 31, 'segment_text': 'and stayed out of sight.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.13, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and remained hidden.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.37}
column32: {'segment_id': 32, 'segment_text': 'That was the second time.', 'recall_id': '63e51cdb4193829cb19b2ebf', 'recall_text': 'About a woman who tried to get close and approach a guy in the neighborhood, but was said that she never forget things easily.', 'recall_len': 126, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.02, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'That incident marked the second occasion.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.32}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'In the neighborhood I grew up in, Mrs. Baker was the resident cat lady.', 'recall_id': '647b55736ed21af1c897158b', 'recall_text': 'One day in my neighbourhood there lived an old lady called Mrs Baker. She was a crazy cat lady. She had adopted twenty, or given them homes. She had a grandson who apparently liked me, although I never realised. One day he ran away because I wasn’t interested in him. The old lady came to see me and told me he had run away. I said “we’d better go look for him” and so we did. We went to the old mill and found his baseball cap but he wasn’t there. We went to the treehouse clubhouse and found him there reading a comic. I thought that was the end of it but the sheriff Officer Dawson came by and told me I’d better lay low because that old lady never forgets.', 'recall_len': 660, 'max_clause_id': 10, 'mbits_original_narrative': 29.43, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Within the community where I was raised, Mrs. Baker was known as the cat lady.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 23.45}
